title: Eugene O'Neill National Historic Site: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       Vehicle Safetyâ€¨ Please do not leave visible items in your vehicle, regardless of value or where you are parking. We are not responsible for lost or stolen property.  Sunblock Sunblock is important when exploring outside areas.  Terrain While most of the walkways in the park are paved, there are some moments of slightly steeper grades. Please be cautious while walking, especially when the paved areas are wet. If you wander off the paths, keep in mind that the grounds can be uneven, with holes, dirt, mud and rocks. Please wear appropriate footwear.  Vehicle Awareness While there is no through traffic in the park, please be aware that some park vehicles do drive around the park roads, paths and park terrain.  Handrails Please, remember to use handrails when available. Steps can be slippery due to weather conditions and moisture.
